title: Korean I
desc: First-quarter course of the beginning college-level sequence to develop basic four language skills in Korean.

title: Korean I
desc:
Second-quarter course of the beginning college-level sequence to develop basic four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 111-1 or equivalent.

title: Korean I
desc:
Third-quarter course of the beginning college-level sequence to develop basic four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 111-2 or equivalent.

title: Korean II
desc:
First-quarter course of the second-year intermediate-level Korean sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 111-3 or equivalent.

title: Korean II
desc:
Second-quarter course of the second-year intermediate-level Korean sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 121-1 or equivalent.

title: Korean II
desc:
Third-quarter course of the second-year intermediate-level Korean sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 121-2 or equivalent.

title: Korean II - Accelerated
desc:
First-quarter course of the accelerated intermediate-level sequence for heritage learners to further develop four language skills. 
Prerequisite: consent of department.

title: Korean II - Accelerated
desc:
Second-quarter course of the accelerated intermediate-level sequence for heritage learners to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 125-1 or equivalent.

title: Korean II - Accelerated
desc:
Third-quarter course of the accelerated intermediate-level sequence for heritage learners to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: Students must have passed Korean 125-2 with at least a C- or be placed in according to placement result.

title: Korean III
desc:
First-quarter course of the intermediate-toward-advanced level sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 121-3, or in KOREAN 125-2, or equivalent.

title: Korean III
desc:
Second-quarter course of the intermediate-toward-advanced level sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 211-1 or equivalent.

title: Korean III
desc:
Third-quarter course of the intermediate-toward-advanced level sequence to further develop four language skills in Korean. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 211-2 or equivalent.

title: Korean IV: Readings in Korean Literature
desc:
Reading literature in Korean to further develop literacy skills and understanding of Korean culture and society. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 211-3 or equivalent.

title: Korean IV: Korean through Movies
desc:
Through Korean films and documentaries, improving oral and writing proficiency, and gaining the knowledge of Korean history, culture, and society. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 211-3 or equivalent.

title: Korean IV: Topics in the News
desc:
Through current news, improving oral and writing profiency and better understanding Korean culture and society. 
Prerequisite: grade of at least C- in KOREAN 211-3 or equivalent.

title: Independent Study
desc:
For students who have advanced with distinction beyond the regular course offerings in Korean. 
Prerequisite: consent of department.
